title: Did Rep. Joe Barton Proclaim ‘Wind Is a Finite Resource’?
subtitle: Texas Rep. Joe Barton supposedly once said that 'wind is a finite resource and harnessing it would slow the winds down, which would cause the temperature to go up.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Rep. Joe Barton said "wind is a finite resource and harnessing it would slow the winds down, which would cause the temperature to go up."
